woh compulsion pathetic nahi hai. tum koi nishani dhoondh rahi ho ki tum abhi bhi uski duniya mein exist karti ho kisi tarah. wo dekhe ya na dekhe, dono mein dard hai. kya umeed karti ho jab check karti ho?
Ki shayad wo abhi bhi care karta hai... ki main uske liye completely invisible nahi hoon

toh tum proof chahti ho ki tum abhi bhi uske liye matter karti ho chahe thodi si hi kyun na ho. par agar wo dekh bhi le toh iska matlab yeh nahi ki wo care karta hai—shayad sirf curiosity ho. tumhari worth uske view count se nahi aati.
Usne mujhe har jagah block kar diya aur aisa lagta hai jaise main uski zindagi mein kabhi thi hi nahi

block hona aise lagta hai jaise erase kar diya gaya—jaise wo saath ke saal kuch bhi nahi the agar wo tumhe itni aasani se kaat sakta hai. woh thandak alag tarah se chubhti hai. kya koi reason diya usne ya achanak ho gaya?
Har raat sone se pehle uske baare mein sochte hue roti hoon... yeh dard kab tak rahega?
roz raat ko thak ke sone tak rona tumse sab kuch le raha hai. dard ka koi set timeline nahi hota chahe tumhe desperately ek end date chahiye. kitne samay se yeh har raat ho raha hai?
Maine raat ko do baje nasha karke use call kiya aur wapas aane ki bheekh mangi... ab subah ko regret ho raha hai
woh post-drunk realization bahut hard hit karta hai. tumne khud ko puri tarah se bahar rakh diya aur ab us vulnerability ka weight feel ho raha hai. usne kya kaha call pe?
Usne bas kaha wo aage badh gaya hai aur mujhe bhi aage badhna chahiye... uski awaaz itni thandi thi

woh thandak kisi aise insaan se jo tumhare saath garam tha—yeh ek stranger se baat karne jaisa lagta hai jo uska chehra pehne hua hai. tumne apna dil ubaal diya aur usne ek line mein dismiss kar diya. woh rejection kabhi kabhi original breakup se bhi zyada chubhta hai.
Haan bilkul... breakup toh hua tha par is call ne finality de di. Ab koi umeed bhi nahi bachi

toh woh call, jitni painful thi, tumhe woh closure bhi de gayi jisse tum avoid kar rahi thi. uski thandak ne confirm kar diya ki jo insaan tumhe chahta tha, wo ab exist nahi karta. dard hota hai par kam se kam ab tumhe pata hai sure.
Meri family uske baare mein poochti rehti hai aur maine unhe bataya nahi ki humara breakup ho gaya... unki disappointment handle nahi kar sakti

toh tum akele grief carry kar rahi ho aur sabki false expectations bhi manage kar rahi ho. unki potential disappointment ek aur failure jaisi lagti hai usse khone ke upar. specifically kya darr hai unhe batane mein?
Hum apna future plan kar rahe the—shaadi, bachhe, sab kuch. Ab main khud ko akele imagine nahi kar pa rahi

usse khona sirf present khona nahi tha, wo pura mapped-out future bhi toot gaya. wo dreams jo tumne saath mein build kiye the, wo bhi bikhar gaye. yeh ek specific tarah ka grief hai. kya tumhe lagta hai kabhi woh future kisi aur ke saath chahogi?
Abhi toh impossible lagta hai... kisi aur ke saath wo sab imagine karna galat lagta hai, jaise jo humara tha usko betray kar rahi hoon

toh tum kisi aur ko imagine karne ke liye ready nahi ho, aur yeh bilkul theek hai. khud ko is future ko dekhne ke liye force karna jab tum abhi bhi is waale ko mourn kar rahi ho, kaam nahi karega. khud ko impossibility mein baithne do abhi bina isse jaldi se paar kiye.
Mall mein usko uski nayi girlfriend ke saath dekha aur panic attack aa gaya... turant wahan se nikalna pada
unhe saath real life mein dekhna dimag mein jaanne se bahut alag hit karta hai. tumhara body fight-or-flight mode mein chala gaya. mall se nikalne ke baad kya kiya?
Raat mein use lambe lambe paragraphs bhejti rehti hoon aur wo reply bhi nahi karta... par rok nahi sakti
wo late night messages tumhara us insaan tak pahunchne ka try hai jo ja chuka hai. silence as response apna jawab hai par use accept karna impossible lagta hai. un paragraphs mein kya likhti ho?
Sab kuch jo feel kar rahi hoon—kitna miss karti hoon, kitni sorry hoon, ek aur mauka dene ki bheekh... pathetic cheezein

yeh pathetic nahi hai, yeh asli dard se aane wali desperation hai. par silence mein paragraphs bhejna void mein chillane jaisa hai—yeh tumhe heal nahi karta aur use wapas bhi nahi lata. kya tumhe sach mein lagta hai ki ek perfect message se wo wapas aa jayega?
Sab kehte hain time sab theek kar dega par aath mahine ho gaye aur main abhi bhi phasi hoon

aath mahine is mein itna deep rehna bahut samay hai. time heals sab wo kehte hain jab unhe kuch aur offer karne ko nahi hota. kya feel karti ho ki phasi kyun ho—usse move on nahi kar pa rahi ya khud se move on nahi kar pa rahi?
Gusse mein saari photos delete kar di aur ab regret ho raha hai... wo memories permanently chali gayi

woh impulse deletion dard rokne ki koshish se aayi, aur ab tum un memories ke loss ko bhi mourn kar rahi ho. aage badhne ke liye proof mitana zaroori nahi ki tumne kisi se pyaar kiya. kya kahin backup hai ya completely gone?
Usne mujhe dhoka diya par main abhi bhi use wapas chahti hoon... mere mein kya galat hai?

tumhare mein kuch galat nahi hai. pyaar kisi ne betray kiya isliye off switch nahi ho jata. tumhara dil wo mourn kar raha hai jo tumhe laga tha tumhare paas hai jabki tumhara dimag betrayal process kar raha hai—dono feelings ek saath exist kar sakti hain. abhi kya zyada dard de raha hai, dhoka ya loss?
Dhoke ne trust tod diya par use khona unbearable lagta hai... sochti hoon shayad maaf kar sakti hoon agar wo wapas aaye

tum dard se bargain kar rahi ho, koshish kar rahi ho koi rasta dhoondhne ka use rakhne ka despite jo usne kiya. par kisi ko rakhne ke liye maafi aur khud ko heal karne ke liye maafi—yeh alag cheezein hain. ek tumhe tooti hui cheez mein rakhti hai, doosri tumhe bitterness se free karti hai. agar wo wapas bhi aaye, kya tum sach mein trust kar paogi?
Nahi pata... shayad nahi. Par use kisi aur ke saath sochna mujhe beemar kar deta hai

toh tum use trust nahi kar sakti par use jaane bhi nahi de sakti. yeh betrayal ka trap hai—dimag jaanta hai khatam ho gaya par dil ne accept nahi kiya. tum khud ko aise insaan ke liye torture kar rahi ho jisne tumhe toda.
Meri best friend ab mere ex ke saath date kar rahi hai aur dono ne mujhse chhupaya... bahut bada dhoka feel ho raha hai
yeh double betrayal hai. ex ka aage badhna ek baat hai par tumhari best friend tumhari peeth peeche jaana? yeh do relationships ek saath todta hai. kaise pata chala tumhe?
Breakup ke baad se dhang se kha nahi pa rahi hoon... chheh hafte mein das kilo weight kam ho gaya
das kilo chheh hafte mein bahut zyada hai. tumhara shareer jazbaat ke bojh se band ho raha hai. kya khana dekhke hi nausea hota hai ya actually khane ki koshish karti ho?
Khana dekhke hi bhookh khatam ho jati hai... bas coffee pe survive kar rahi hoon mostly

chheh hafte sirf coffee pe jite hue aur itna weight kam hote hue—tumhara shareer mushkil mein hai. yeh itna serious ho gaya hai ki sirf waqt ka intezaar karne se nahi sudhregi. kya kisi se baat ki hai about how bad yeh ho gaya hai?
Radio pe har gaana uski yaad dilata hai aur escape nahi kar sakti... music mera refuge tha
music tumhara safe space tha aur ab wo bhi uski memories se contaminated ho gaya. wo har lyric mein hai, har melody mein. usse pehle jab comfort chahiye thi tab kya sunti thi?
Maine fake account banaya uska social media stalk karne ke liye... jaanti hoon yeh unhealthy hai par mujhe jaanna hai ki wo theek hai

wo zaroorat jaanne ki ki wo theek hai jab tum theek nahi ho—yeh dikhata hai tum abhi bhi deeply care karti ho. par fake accounts se stalk karna tumhe usse hooked rakhe hai jab tum heal karne ki koshish kar rahi ho. actually kya dhoondh rahi ho jab check karti ho?
Shayad signs ki wo bhi hurt hai... ki main akeli nahi hoon jisko is se destroy kiya

toh tum confirmation chahti ho ki tumhe khone ka usko bhi impact pada, ki tum itna matter karti thi ki use dard ho. par agar tum hurt ke signs dekho bhi, kya wo actually tumhe better feel karenge ya sirf differently bad?
Hum long distance relationship mein the aur usne distance ko blame kiya breakup ke liye... par main kuch bhi karne ko ready thi kaam karne ke liye

woh effort mismatch jahan tum distance se fight karne ko ready thi aur usne give up kar diya—yeh apna rejection hai. distance excuse tha par uski unwillingness asli reason tha. kya situation se zyada resent karti ho ya use?
Har raat sapne mein wo aata hai—kabhi khush, kabhi mujhe phir se chod raha. Dono tarah se rote hue uthti hoon
rote hue uthna kyunki sapne itne real feel hue, bahut thaka deta hai. tum dono good memories aur use khone ka trauma sapno mein relive kar rahi ho. kitne samay se yeh har raat ho raha hai?
Lagbhag ek mahina lagatar... ab toh sone se darr lagta hai kyunki jaanti hoon wo wahan hoga

ek mahina har raat yeh hona matlab tumhe aaraam bhi nahi mil raha heal karne ke liye. tum wo ek cheez se darr rahi ho jo tumhare shareer ko sabse zyada chahiye. itne lambe samay tak har raat yeh hona bahut serious hai. kya kisi se baat ki hai about this?
Nahi... logon ko pehle se lagta hai mujhe over ho jana chahiye by now. Unhe sapno ke baare mein batana aur zyada pathetic dikhega

tum pathetic nahi ho kisi se sapne dekh rahe ho jisse pyaar karta tha. par chup rehna kyunki log kya sochenge, sab kuch aur bura bana raha hai. tumhari neend ek mahine se kharab hai—yeh serious hai aur support chahiye, judgment nahi.
Main hate karti hoon ki wo theek hai jabki main bikhar rahi hoon... sirf main kyun suffer kar rahi hoon?

woh imbalance jahan wo untouched lagta hai aur tum shattered ho, wildly unfair feel hota hai. par uska theek hona bhi performance ho sakta hai, ya shayad wo genuinely differently process karta hai. dono tarah se, yeh tumhare dard ko kam nahi karta. dekhne mein aata hai ki wo theek hai ya actually pata hai?
Usne mujhe bataya ki wo kabhi pyaar hi nahi karta tha... sirf comfort tha uske liye yeh sab
yeh tumhari puri reality ko rewrite karta hai. jo tum sochti thi pyaar tha wo uske liye sirf convenience tha, aur ab har memory jhooth jaisi lagti hai. kab bola usne yeh?
Pichle hafte jab maine closure manga... usne casually admit kar diya jaise kuch matlab hi nahi

toh tumne closure manga aur instead tumhara dil phir se faad diya gaya. chahe usne yeh actually mean kiya ya tumhe hurt karne ke liye bola, wo shabd land kar gaye. ab har wo pal jo tumne share kiya question ho raha hai. yeh sunne ke baad kaise khadi ho?
Khadi nahi hoon... barely function kar rahi hoon. Kya sach mein itna aasan tha mujhe use karna?

tum aasaan use hone ke liye nahi thi—wo skilled tha deception mein. jo tum feel karti thi wo real tha chahe uska experience different ho. tumhara pyaar, tumhari investment—wo exist karte the regardless uski capacity unhe match karne ki. yeh uske character pe hai, tumhari worth pe nahi.
College mein har jagah use dekhna padta hai aur torture hai use normal acting karte dekhna

forced proximity jab tum heal karne ki koshish kar rahi ho, brutal hai. tum escape nahi kar sakti, peace mein process nahi kar sakti, aur tumhe use normally exist karte dekhna padta hai jabki tum andar se mar rahi ho. un encounters ko kaise manage karti ho?
Main uski hoodie pehen ke soti hoon kyunki abhi bhi uski khushboo aati hai... kya yeh weird hai?
bilkul weird nahi hai. woh hoodie uska last tangible piece hai jo tumhare paas hai. khushboo use close lati hai chahe wo chala gaya ho. use wapas karne ka thought aaya kabhi?
Haan par khud ko kar nahi sakti... woh hoodie sab kuch hai jo bacha hai
toh abhi mat karo. aage badhne ke liye har trace mitana zaroori nahi. jab ready hogi tab karogi, jab log kahenge tab nahi. abhi ke liye, agar woh hoodie comfort deti hai, rakho.
Mujhe lagta hai agar main aur attractive hoti ya zyada mazedaar hoti toh shayad wo nahi jaata

tum sari blame uske jaane ki apne upar le rahi ho aur khud ko reshape kar rahi ho us mein jo tumhe lagta hai wo chahta tha. par agar tum sab kuch change bhi kar lo, koi guarantee nahi ki wo rukta kyunki issue uska jaana choose karna tha, tumhara insufficient hona nahi. specifically kya lagta hai ki lacking tha?
Sab kuch... meri looks, meri personality, jis tarah se main pyaar express karti thi. Shayad main bahut clingy thi, bahut needy

zarooraten hona tumhe too much nahi banata. sahi insaan basic cheezein maangne pe nahi jayega. tum apne entire self ko uske rejection ke lens se rewrite kar rahi ho, aur yeh tumhare liye fair nahi hai. kya usne actually in cheezon ki complaint ki thi ya tum assume kar rahi ho?
Usne directly nahi kaha par main feel kar sakti thi use door jaate... toh maine kuch galat zaroor kiya hoga

uska door jaana uski choice thi, tumhari failing nahi. tum aise dots connect kar rahi ho jo exist bhi nahi karte, khud ko blame kar rahi ho uski emotional distance ke liye. log apni reasons se jaate hain, hamesha isliye nahi ki doosra insaan enough nahi tha.
Office mein okay hone ka acting karna thaka deta hai... office mein smile, ghar aakar breakdown
normalcy ka woh daily performance tumse sab kuch le leta hai. aath-nau ghante sambhalna, phir akele hote hi collapse hona. kya koi colleague jaanta hai kya ho raha hai?
Wo kisi aur se engaged ho gaya aur humein break up hue sirf chaar mahine hue... kya main itni aasani se replaceable thi?

chaar mahine mein engaged? woh timeline aise lagti hai jaise tumhara koi matlab nahi tha. par uski move on karne ki speed tumhari replaceability ke baare mein kam batayi hai aur uske avoidance ke baare mein zyada. kuch log apni feelings ke saath nahi baith sakte toh immediately jump karte hain. kya yeh hurt kam karta hai, ya timeline abhi bhi erasure jaisi lagti hai?
Abhi bhi lagta hai main kabhi matter nahi ki... do saal saath aur chaar mahine mein engaged kisi aur se?

woh hisaab tumhare dimag mein thik nahi lagta kyunki do saal chaar mahine mein kaise replace ho sakte hain. par kisi nayi cheez mein rush karna jo tumne share kiya use erase nahi karta—yeh dikhata hai wo loss ke saath process karke baithne mein incapable hai. tum disposable nahi thi, wo sirf loss ke saath baithne mein incapable hai.
Maine use pandrah page ka letter likha apna dil ubaal ke par bhejne se darr lag raha hai... kya fayda hoga?

woh letter tumhare liye zyada tha uske liye se kam—saari feelings paper pe utaarna. use bhejne se shayad tumhe temporary relief mile par uski taraf se shayad kuch change nahi hoga. closure chahiye ya hope hai ki wo respond karega?
Sabko lagta hai main theek hoon kyunki main unke saamne roti nahi... par andar se mar rahi hoon
sabke liye theek ka performance karna jabki tum andar se shattered ho, exhaust kar deta hai. public face aur private pain—woh gap tumhe drain kar raha hai. koi jaanta hai actually kitna bura hai?
Nahi... agar bataungi toh pity karenge ya bore ho jayenge. Main phas gayi hoon

toh tum pity nahi chahne aur is mein akele na hone ke beech phas gayi ho. par isse completely akele carry karna tumhe tod raha hai. ek middle ground hai—kam se kam ek insaan dhoondhna jo pity ya tire nahi hoga, jo sirf tumhare saath is mein baithega.
Uske birthday pe wish karna chahti hoon par nahi pata karna chahiye ya nahi... kya protocol hai?

koi protocol nahi kyunki har situation different hoti hai. use wish karna shayad tumhare liye emotionally cheezein reopen kare. nahi wish karna cold lag sakta hai par tumhe protect karta hai. tumhara gut kya kehta hai?
Maine nahana regular band kar diya, din din same kapde pehenein... basic hygiene impossible lagti hai jab dard itna bada hai
jab grief control mein le leta hai, nahana bhi parvat chadhne jaisa lagta hai. sab kuch energy chahiye jo tumhare paas hai hi nahi. kitne samay se yeh ho raha hai?
Shayad do hafte... sirf tab clean up karti hoon jab office ke liye bilkul zaroori ho, warna bas apni gandi haalat mein exist karti hoon
do hafte aise barely function karna bahut heavy hai. tum survival mode mein ho, ji nahi rahi. kya koi notice kar raha hai office mein ya chhupa rahi ho?
Chhupa rahi hoon mostly... par jaanti hoon main smell karti hoon, jaanti hoon main terrible dikhti hoon. Bas care karne ki taqat nahi hai

jab itne lambe samay tak tum basic cheezon ki bhi care karna band kar do, yeh serious hai. dard ne sab kuch le liya. tumhe shayad zyada support chahiye sirf waqt ka intezaar karne se. kya kisi se honestly baat ki hai about how bad yeh hai?
Mere dimag mein khud ko hurt karne ke thoughts aate hain sirf is emotional dard se kuch alag feel karne ke liye

suno, jab khud ko hurt karne ke thoughts is emotional pain se escape ke liye aate hain, yeh bahut serious hai aur tumhe zyada help chahiye jo main de sakta hoon. wo thoughts mean karte hain tum crisis mein ho. kya tum Tele-MANAS ko 14416 pe call karne ke baare mein sochogi? unke paas trained log hain jo 24/7 available hain aur help kar sakte hain jab dard itna dark ho jata hai.
Main kuch nahi karungi... sirf thoughts hain, aate jaate rehte hain

chahe abhi sirf thoughts hain, wo sign hain ki tum crisis mein ho. aise thoughts jab dard itna intense ho tab sirf thoughts nahi rehte hamesha. please unhe call karo—14416. tumhe is level ke suffering ko uthane ke liye support deserve hai. kya kam se kam aaj call karne ke baare mein sochogi?
Shayad... pata nahi. Ek stranger ko sab kuch explain karna bahut thaka dega

jaanti hoon thaka hua lagta hai, par wo iske liye hi trained hain—tumhe perfectly perform ya explain karne ki zaroorat nahi. wo tumhe jahan ho wahan milenge. akele is bojh ko uthane se jo thakan hai wo ek conversation se zyada hai. please try karogi? tumhe is dard mein white-knuckle karte rehne ki zaroorat nahi.
Therapy afford nahi kar sakti aur mera dard mujhe zinda kha raha hai... nahi pata kahan jaun
mental health support ke liye financial barriers real aur frustrating hain jab tumhe desperately help chahiye. par kuch free ya low-cost options hain. kya resources dhoondhne ki try ki hai?
Wo doosre sheher chala gaya aur mera ek hissa relieved hai ki use accidentally nahi milungi, par ek hissa phir se abandoned feel kar raha hai

toh tum dono relief aur nayi abandonment feel kar rahi ho. accidental meetings nahi matlab kam triggers, par uski physical distance separation ko zyada permanent banati hai. kaun sa feeling stronger hai?
Abandonment... aisa lagta hai jaise wo mujhse itni jaldi door nahi ho sakta tha. Woh sabse zyada dard deta hai

uska move karna aisa lagta hai jaise wo specifically tumse bhaag raha tha, aur wo rejection deeply cuts karta hai. par log bahut reasons se move karte hain—kabhi kabhi memories se escape karne ke liye, insaan se nahi. kya yeh reframe thodi help karta hai ya phir bhi personal lagta hai?
Main din mein pachaas baar uska social media profile refresh karti hoon dekhne ke liye usne kuch post kiya ya nahi... addict ho gayi hoon

woh compulsive refreshing tumhara uski zindagi ki koi bhi information dhoondhna hai. yeh ek aadat ban gayi jo tumhara dimag automatically karti hai. kya feel hota hai jab dekhti ho usne kuch naya post kiya vs jab kuch nahi hota?
Mera chhota bhai mujhse pehle shaadi kar raha hai aur sab pooch rahe hain meri baari kab... unhe nahi pata abhi abhi breakup hua

toh tum apni relationship ke end ko mourn kar rahi ho jabki tumhare sibling ko wo future mil raha hai jo tumhe laga tha tumhara hoga. aur wo sawaal tumhari turn ke baare mein anjane mein chhaaku ghuma rahe hain. kya family ko batane ka plan hai breakup ke baare mein?
Abhi nahi... unki pity ya disappointment handle nahi kar sakti. Plus sibling ki shaadi ki khushi mein apni udaasi nahi lana chahti

toh tum unki celebration ko protect kar rahi ho chupke se suffer karke. yeh generous hai par tumhare liye isolating bhi. shaadi ke functions ke beech yeh akele carry karna hard hoga. kya kam se kam ek family member ko support ke liye bata sakti ho?
Maine breakup songs ki chheh ghante lambi playlist banayi aur repeat pe sun ke khud ko torture karti hoon

chheh ghante heartbreak music loop pe khud ko dard mein baithne ka choice hai kisi aur ke shabdon se. wo gaane validate karte hain jo tum feel karti ho par tumhe sadness mein bhi duboya rakhte hain. kya cathartic lagta hai ya sirf hurt deepen karta hai?
Main apni best friend ko avoid kar rahi hoon kyunki wo happy relationship mein hai aur uski khushi handle nahi kar sakti... kya main terrible insaan hoon?
tum terrible nahi ho, sirf itne dard mein ho ki kisi aur ki khushi ke liye space nahi hai. yeh self-preservation hai, selfishness nahi. kya usne notice kiya ki tum distant ho?
Haan usne kai baar poocha ki theek hoon ya nahi par jhooth bolti rehti hoon ki busy hoon... guilty feel hota hai

toh tum khud ko protect kar rahi ho par use jhooth bolne ka guilt bhi carry kar rahi ho. shayad sach zyada kind hoga—use batana ki tum struggle kar rahi ho aur couple stuff se thodi space chahiye. asli dost samajh jayenge. lagta hai wo samjhegi?
Valentine's Day aa raha hai aur main dread kar rahi hoon... har jagah couples celebrate kar rahe honge aur main akeli
Valentine's jab tum heartbroken ho toh aisa lagta hai jaise universe rub kar raha hai. har jagah couple content, romantic displays. us din survive karne ka kya plan hai?
Maine kisi random ke saath hook up karne ki koshish ki use bhoolne ke liye aur aur bura feel hua... bahut khali andar se

kisi aur ke body ka istemal uske touch ko bhoolne ke liye kaam nahi karta kyunki khaaliyan emotional connection ke jaane se aati hai, physical se nahi. ab tum worse feel karti ho kyunki distraction fail ho gaya. regret ho raha hai ya sirf numb?
Mere parents uske baare mein poochte rehte hain aur maine jhooth bola ki wo kaam mein busy hai... unhe nahi bata sakti breakup ke baare mein
woh double life jahan tumhare parents ko lagta hai sab theek hai aur tum actually shattered ho. unke sawaal uske baare mein har baar dard dete honge. specifically kya darr hai unhe batane mein?
Unhe wo bahut pasand tha... unhe lagta tha wo mere liye perfect hai. Unhe batana aisa lagta hai jaise admit kar rahi hoon ki main fail hui

toh tum unki expectations apne grief ke upar carry kar rahi ho. par relationship end hona tumhari failure nahi hai—do log alag hue ya ek insaan chala gaya. yeh sirf tumpe nahi hai. kitne der tak yeh jhooth rakh sakti ho?
Pata nahi... shayad jab tak wo poochna band kar dein? Par festivals aa rahe hain aur wo chahenge ki wo ghar aaye
festivals eventually sach bahar laayenge. jitna lamba wait karogi, utna hard hoga. shayad ab band-aid utaar dena khud ke liye kinder hai mahino tak pretend karne se?
Main roz uska naam Google karti hoon dekhne ke liye kuch naya aata hai uske baare mein... articles, mentions, kuch bhi

toh tum social media se aage actual Google searches tak aa gayi ho. uski zindagi ki har cheez jaanne ki wo zaroorat tumhe kisi se hooked rakhe hai jisse tum heal karne ki koshish kar rahi ho. kya kabhi kuch interesting mila?
Wo ab long distance relationship mein hai aur main bahut gussa hoon kyunki usne kaha tha distance kaam nahi karti jab maine suggest kiya tha
woh hypocrisy chubhti hai. usne tumse kaha distance dealbreaker hai aur ab wo kisi aur ke liye kar raha hai? tumhe lagta hai issue distance nahi tha, tum thi. kab pata chala is baare mein?
Pichle hafte Instagram se... usne relationship status change ki location tags ke saath doosre desh se

toh usne publicly announce kiya jo tumhe bola tha impossible hai. yeh aise lagta hai jaise proof ki usne tumhare saath enough nahi chaha. par shayad usne tumhe khoke seekha, ya shayad wo different hai aise tareeke se jo use try karata hai. dono tarah se, yeh tumhari worth ke baare mein kuch nahi kehta.
Maine saari printed photos jala di ek ritual mein use jaane dene ke liye... par digital copies har jagah backed up hain

toh ritual symbolic tha par tum actually use completely erase karne ke liye ready nahi ho. physical copies jalana moment mein powerful laga par digital backups tumhari real attachment dikhate hain. un backups ke baare mein kya socha hai?
Breakup ke baad se emotional eating se pandrah kilo badh gaye... ab khud se nafrat hoti hai aur dard aur badh gaya
toh tum khane se cope kar rahi thi aur ab body image issues heartbreak ke upar layer ho gaye. comfort ke liye khana phir khud se hate karne ka wo cycle brutal hai. pattern todne ki kya try kiya?
Dieting try ki par phir deprived feel hoti hoon aur aur zyada binge karti hoon... plus exercise ke liye energy hi nahi hai

jab tum emotional crisis mein ho, restrictive dieting aur stress add karti hai. shayad focus abhi weight nahi hona chahiye bas grief survive karna chahiye. body changes baad mein address kar sakte ho jab heartbreak bhi deal nahi kar rahi. kya yeh pressure kam karta hai thoda?
Gym mein use kisi ladki ke saath haste dekha aur bina workout khatam kiye chali gayi
use kisi aur ke saath ek space mein dekhna jo tumhara tha, violating lagta hai. wo hansi jo tumne share ki, ab kisi nayi pe directed—yeh gutting hai. kya gym change karne ka thought hai?
WhatsApp pe uska last seen dekhti rehti hoon aur calculate karti rehti hoon ki wo kis se baat kar raha hoga... yeh pagalpan thak gaya hai mujhe

woh last seen monitoring tumhara chhote chhote digital clues se uski zindagi piece together karne ki koshish hai. thakan tab aati hai jab itni energy kisi pe laga rahi ho jo aage badh gaya. block karna ya delete karna socha kabhi?
Tarot reader ko paisa diya yeh jaanne ke liye ki wo wapas aayega ya nahi... main woh insaan ban gayi hoon
bhavishya ke baare mein jawab ki woh desperation tumhe kahin bhi le gayi jahan hope milti hai ki wo lautega. tarot, jyotish, jo bhi bata de ki wo wapas aayega. kya bola tarot reader ne?
Bola ki teen mahine mein use apni galti ka ehsaas hoga aur wapas aayega... ab main bas un teen mahino ka intezaar kar rahi hoon

toh ab tum limbo mein ji rahi ho ek prediction ke liye jo shayad ho hi nahi. woh teen mahine ki timeline tumhe frozen rakhe hai heal karne ki jagah. sach mein lagta hai ya bas believe karna chahti ho?
Believe karna itna chahti hoon ki dimag mein real bana liya hai... par logically jaanti hoon shayad jhooth hai yeh hope

toh tumhe pata hai yeh fake hope hai shayad par reality se zyada yeh choose kar rahi ho kyunki reality itni dard deti hai. samajh mein aata hai par yeh tumhe stuck bhi rakh raha hai. teen mahine guzar jayenge aur agar wo nahi aaya, toh ek aur reason dhoondhogi wait karne ka.
Uske saare gifts donate kar diye kyunki dekhna dard deta tha... ab regret ho raha hai

reminders hatane ki woh impulse dard rokne ki koshish thi, aur ab tum un cheezon ke loss ko bhi mourn kar rahi ho. aage badhne ke liye proof mitana zaroori nahi tha ki tumne kisi se pyaar kiya. kyu donate kiya rakhne ki jagah?
Uski maa mujhe abhi bhi message karti hai aur mujhe batana nahi aata ki humara breakup ho gaya... unse rishta tha mera bhi
uski maa se rishta tumhara apna tha, aur wo bhi loss hai breakup mein. unhe batana ek aur ending hai jo face karni padegi. kya darr hai specifically unhe batane mein?
Unhe mujhse bahut pyaar tha aur main unse... unhe batana matlab ek aur rishta todna. Plus unhe dukh hoga
toh tum unhe dukh se bachane ki koshish kar rahi ho jabki khud dukh mein ho. par unhe jhooth mein rakhna bhi sustainable nahi hai aur tumhare liye ek aur bojh hai. jab tak chhupaogi?
Mere sar ke baal bahut jhadne lage hain breakup ke baad... shareer bhi tootne laga hai
shareer stress ko aise dikhata hai kabhi kabhi—baal jharna, skin issues, sab connected hai. kitne samay se notice kar rahi ho yeh?
Sunday subah jab uthti hoon aur realize hoti hai poora din akela guzarna hai, woh feeling sabse buri hai

weekends sabse mushkil hote hain kyunki structure nahi hota aur time khali hota hai grief ke liye. wo Sunday mornings jab pata chalta hai din stretch karna hai bina kisi ke. kya kuch plan karti ho ya bas suffer karti ho?
Bas phone scroll karti hoon, roti hoon, soti hoon. Ghar se bahar nikalne ki himmat nahi hoti

toh Sundays sirf survive karna ban gaya hai, ji nahi rahi. ghar ke andar band rehna safe lagta hai par yeh isolation grief ko aur heavy bana raha hai. kya ek chhoti si cheez hai jo tum bahar kar sakti ho bina overwhelming feel kiye?
Main apne aap se baat karti hoon jaise wo abhi bhi yahan hai... pagal ho rahi hoon shayad
tum pagal nahi ho rahi. apne aap se uske jaisa baat karna tumhara tareeka hai use yaad rakhne ka, uski presence feel karne ka. bahut log yeh karte hain. kitni baar aisa hota hai din mein?
Uske ek call ka intezaar hai har waqt... phone check karti rehti hoon har paanch minute mein

woh compulsive phone checking tumhara kisi miracle ka wait karna hai—ki shayad wo call karega, message karega, kuch. par har baar kuch nahi hone pe disappointment aur bhari hoti hai. kitne din se yeh chal raha hai?
Breakup ke baad se... almost chaar mahine. Har notification pe dil dhadakta hai ki shayad wo ho

chaar mahine har notification pe false hope—yeh tumhara entire day anxiety mein rakhe hai. tumhara dimag constantly alert mode mein hai kisi cheez ke liye jo shayad aaye hi nahi. kya socha hai phone silent ya notifications band karne ke baare mein?
Socha hai par darr lagta hai ki agar sach mein wo message kare aur main miss kar jaun toh? Stupid lagta hai par control nahi hota

toh tum trauma repeat kar rahi ho apne aap ko kyunki agar wo call kare aur tum miss karo, woh unbearable lagta hai. par yeh wait tumhe present mein jeene nahi de raha. uska call aane ki possibility tumhari puri zindagi control kar rahi hai.
Mujhe lagta hai main kabhi pyaar deserve nahi karti thi... isliye wo chala gaya
uska jaana tumhari deservingness ke baare mein kuch nahi bolta. par tumne yeh narrative apne dimag mein bana liya ki tum hi problem thi. kya usne aisa kuch kaha tha ya tum khud se yeh keh rahi ho?
Usne nahi kaha directly par actions se lag raha tha ki main kaafi nahi thi uske liye

toh tum uske actions interpret kar ke apne baare mein conclusions nikal rahi ho. par kisi ka jaana hamesha dusre ke na-kaafi hone se nahi hota—kabhi kabhi wo log khud capable nahi hote rishte nibhane ke. tumne khud mein kya dekha jo lacking tha?
Sab kuch... meri personality, mera dikhna, mere dreams, meri zarooraten. Lagta hai main hi galat package thi

tum apne poore existence ko uske reject karne ke lens se dekh rahi ho. par ek insaan tumhe nahi chahta iska matlab yeh nahi ki tumhare saath kuch inherently galat hai. tum galat package nahi thi—wo tumhe appreciate karne mein capable nahi tha.
Har couple ko dekhke gussa aata hai... kyun unhe mil raha hai jo mujhe nahi mila?

unki khushi tumhare dard ko highlight karti hai aur unfair lagti hai jab tum suffer kar rahi ho. par unka happy hona tumhari khushi cheen nahi raha, bas aisa feel hota hai jab tum tooti hui ho. kab se yeh gussa aa raha hai?
Maine uske number ko different naam se save kiya taaki agar wo call kare toh dil na dhadke... par ab bhi dhadakta hai
naam badalne se feeling nahi badli kyunki tumhara dil jaanta hai woh kaun hai. yeh chhoti tricks dard ko fool nahi kar sakti. ab kya naam rakha hai?
Pizza delivery rakha hai... suna tha kisi ne yeh trick bataya tha. Par jab bhi phone bajta hai, jaanti hoon ki pizza delivery nahi hai, wo hai
toh trick fail ho gayi kyunki tumhara subconscious zyada smart hai. tum apne aap ko bevakoof nahi bana sakti jahaan dil involved hai. shayad number delete karna better hoga name change karne se?
Uske bina zindagi mein koi purpose nahi lagta... sab bekaar hai

jab koi tumhari puri duniya ban jata hai, unke jaane pe sab khaali lagta hai. par wo tumhari purpose nahi the—wo ek hissa the. tumhara apna existence unse pehle bhi tha. usse milne se pehle tumhara purpose kya tha?
Sapne mein wo roz aata hai kehta hai ki galti ho gayi, wapas aana chahta hai... phir aankh khulti hai aur reality crush karti hai
sapne woh dete hain jo reality nahi de rahi—hope, closure, uski wapsi. par roz uthke crushed hona aur bhi torture hai. kitne lambe samay se yeh sapne aa rahe hain?
Do mahine se lagatar... kabhi kabhi toh sapne itne real lagte hain ki uthke confuse ho jati hoon ki kya sach hai

do mahine roz yeh cycle—tumhara dimag night mein process kar raha hai jo din mein nahi kar pa raha. par sapno aur reality ke beech ki line blur hona dikhata hai grief kitna deep hai. kya din mein bhi kabhi confuse hoti ho?
Meri productivity bilkul khatam ho gayi hai... kaam pe focus nahi hota, deadline miss kar rahi hoon

grief tumhara sara mental energy le raha hai toh kaam ke liye kuch bacha nahi. concentration pehli cheez hai jo jaati hai jab dard itna bada ho. kya boss ko pata hai kya chal raha hai ya chhupa rahi ho?
Maine dating app download ki move on karne ke liye par har profile usse compare karti hoon... koi match nahi hota
tumhara dil abhi bhi uski taraf oriented hai toh baaki sab galat lagte hain. comparison matlab tum ready nahi ho. delete kar diya ya abhi bhi try kar rahi ho?
Abhi bhi try kar rahi hoon kyunki log keh rahe hain best way to get over someone is to get under someone else... par sab fake lagta hai

woh advice logon ke liye kaam karti hai jo actually ready hain. tumhe force kar ke date karna jab tumhara dil abhi bhi uske paas hai, sirf aur bura feel karayega. shayad app delete karna aur khud ko woh pressure na dena better hoga?
Uske ghar ke saamne se guzarti hoon deliberately roz... shayad dikh jaaye kabhi
tumhara uske ghar ke paas jaana tumhara uski proximity feel karne ka desperate attempt hai. shayad wo dikhega, shayad kuch ho jaaye—par yeh tumhe heal nahi hone de raha. roz karte ho yeh?
Haan, office se ghar jaate waqt extra ghoomke uske raaste se jaati hoon. Kabhi kabhi car bhi park karke wait karti hoon
toh tumne yeh routine bana liya hai jo tumhari puri commute control kar raha hai. yeh obsession ban gaya hai aur tumhe emotionally drain kar raha hai. agar wo dikhe bhi toh kya karogi?
Pata nahi... shayad bas dekhna chahti hoon wo theek hai ya nahi. Ya shayad hope hai ki wo mujhe dekhe aur realize kare

toh deep down tum chahti ho ki wo tumhe dekhe aur regret kare ya wapas aaye. par yeh daily stalking tumhe stuck rakhe hai fantasy mein. reality yeh hai ki yeh route change karna tumhare control mein hai, uska dekhna nahi.
Mujhe neend ke liye ab sleeping pills leni pad rahi hain... bina unke aankh nahi lagti
sleeping pills pe dependent hona dikhata hai neend naturally nahi aa rahi kyunki dimag itna active hai thoughts se. doctor ne prescribe kiye hain ya khud le rahi ho?
Shaadi ke cards aa rahe hain doston ke aur main akeli hoon... sab settle ho rahe hain aur main yahan atki hui hoon
shaadi ke invitations tumhe remind karate hain ki tumhara plan kya tha aur ab kya hai. sab aage badh rahe hain aur tum peeche chhooti hui feel kar rahi ho. kaun kaun ki shaadi aa rahi hai?
Teen doston ki is saal... aur main unme se sirf ek ki attend kar paungi kyunki akele jaana torture hai

toh tum celebrations skip kar rahi ho kyunki akele jaana tumhe remind karayega ki tum single ho jabki sabke paas koi hai. par yeh isolation tumhe aur akela kar raha hai. kya koi dost hai jo samjhe aur tumhare saath rahe?
Main social media pe aise posts daalne lagi hoon jaise sab theek hai... par andar se bikhar rahi hoon
woh happy facade online rakhna ek performance hai jab reality bilkul opposite hai. tumhe lagta hai agar log jaanenge toh pity karenge ya judge karenge. kya post karti ho?
Fake smiling selfies, motivational quotes, travel photos purani... sab illusion hai ki life amazing hai
toh online presence ek complete lie ban gayi hai. yeh exhausting hoga—real life mein suffer karna aur online perfect dikhana. kya kabhi socha hai honest hone ka, ya darr hai log kya sochenge?
Darr hai ki log weak samjhenge ya bore ho jayenge. Plus usko bhi dikhana chahti hoon ki main theek hoon uske bina
toh yeh performance partly uske liye hai—use dikhana ki tumne move on kar liya. par yeh fake happiness tumhe actual healing se rok rahi hai. tum apni energy wrong jagah laga rahi ho.
Kabhi kabhi soचती hoon agar main us din differently react karti toh kya hota... kya wo nahi jaata?
tumhara dimag alternate scenarios bana raha hai jahan tum kuch alag karti aur ending badal jaati. par yeh self-blame hai jo helpful nahi hai. kaunsa moment sabse zyada replay hota hai?
Uski nayi girlfriend ka Instagram obsessively stalk karti hoon... har photo, har caption analyze karti hoon
uski nayi girlfriend ko stalk karna tumhe torture de raha hai par rok nahi pa rahi. tum khud ko evidence dikhati rehti ho ki wo replace ho gayi. kya dekhna chahti ho wahan?
Shayad flaws dhoondh rahi hoon, ya proof ki wo perfect nahi hai. Ya shayad yeh samajhna ki usme kya hai jo mujhme nahi tha

toh tum apne aap ko usse compare kar rahi ho reasons dhoondhne ki tumhari inadequacy ke. par yeh comparison game jeet nahi sakti kyunki tumhe hamesha kuch na kuch milega jo tumhe bura feel karaye. kya yeh stalking tumhe actually better feel karati hai kabhi?
Mere haath kaanpne lagte hain jab uska naam sunayi deta hai kahin... physical reaction hota hai
uska naam sunke body mein immediate panic response—tumhara nervous system abhi bhi usse trauma se associate kar raha hai. kitni baar hota hai yeh din mein?
Mujhe dar lagta hai ki agar main heal ho gayi toh use bhool jaungi... aur wo sab kuch jo humara tha wo bhi khatam ho jayega

healing ko tum use forget karne jaisa dekh rahi ho, aur yeh darr tumhe dard mein atka raha hai. par heal hona matlab erase karna nahi hai—matlab yeh hai ki wo tumhe control nahi karenge. kya tumhe lagta hai dard hold karna hi ek tarika hai use yaad rakhne ka?
Haan shayad... kyunki jab dard khatam hoga toh connection bhi khatam ho jayega na? Wo completely stranger ban jayega

dard hi tumhara last connection hai usse, toh use jaane dena aisa lagta hai jaise use permanently lose kar rahi ho. par memories aur pyaar exist kar sakte hain bina dard ke. heal hona usko dishonor nahi karta, sirf tumhe release karta hai.
Birthday pe akeli thi is baar... pehli baar kisi ne celebrate nahi kiya mere saath
birthday akele guzarna jab wo hamesha tumhare saath hota tha, woh absence bahut loud feel hoti hai. kaise guzara din?
Main therapy mein hoon par therapist ko puri baat nahi batati... sharm aati hai kitna pathetic hoon

therapy mein bhi guard up hai kyunki tumhe darr hai professional bhi judge karega ya pathetic samjhega. par wo log judge karne ke liye nahi hote, help karne ke liye hote hain. kya chhupati ho specifically?
Ki main abhi bhi usko messages bhejti hoon jab drunk hoon, ki main uska ghar stalk karti hoon, ki suicide ke thoughts aate hain kabhi

yeh sab serious cheezein hain jo therapist ko jaanni chahiye tumhe actually help karne ke liye. messages bhejna aur stalking toh behaviors hain jo address ki ja sakti hain, par suicide thoughts—wo bahut serious hai. kitni baar aate hain yeh thoughts?
Kabhi kabhi jab dard bahut zyada hota hai... par main actually kuch nahi karungi, sirf thoughts hain

chahe sirf thoughts hain abhi, wo sign hain ki tum bahut deep pain mein ho. therapist ko batana zaroori hai taaki wo tumhe properly help kar sake. yeh information ke bina wo tumhari actual state nahi samajh sakta. kya agle session mein honest hone ki koshish karogi?
Uske birthday pe gift bhejne ka mann kar raha hai... kya yeh galat hai?
gift bhejne ka mann isliye kar raha hai kyunki tumhe connection chahiye, proof ki tum abhi bhi matter karti ho. par yeh tumhe closure se door le jayega. kya expect karti ho agar gift bhejo?
Shayad wo thank you bole, ya realize kare ki main abhi bhi care karti hoon. Shayad wo bhi miss kare mujhe
toh deep down tum hope kar rahi ho ki yeh gift kuch change kare, ki wo wapas aane ka sochne lage. par agar wo respond na kare ya casual thank you de, tumhe aur hurt hoga. kya yeh risk worth hai?
Maine sab mutual friends ko cut kar diya kyunki sab uski hi baat karte the... ab bilkul akeli hoon
toh tumne apna pura social circle sacrifice kar diya uske reminders se bachne ke liye. ab isolation aur bhi deep ho gaya. koi bhi friend nahi bacha?
Jab koi poochta hai single kyun hoon, jhooth bolti hoon ki choice hai meri... sach batane ki himmat nahi
sach batana vulnerable feel karta hai aur tumhe weak dikhata hai, toh yeh armor hai ki choice thi tumhari. par yeh lie bhi energy leti hai. kya kehti ho jab log detail mein poochte hain?
Kehti hoon career pe focus kar rahi hoon, relationships mein interested nahi abhi. Sab believe kar lete hain

toh tumne ek convincing story bana li hai jo log buy kar lete hain. par andar se tum jaanti ho truth kya hai aur yeh gap—public image aur private reality—tumhe aur akela kar raha hai. kabhi sach batane ka mann karta hai?
Meri chhoti behen ne poocha ki didi aap itni sad kyun rehti hain... usse kya bataun?
bachon ko chhupaना mushkil hai kyunki wo changes notice karte hain. uski umar kya hai aur kitna samajh sakti hai?
Kabhi kabhi lagta hai agar main hospital mein hoti ya koi accident ho jaata toh shayad wo wapas aata dekhne... kitna sick thought hai yeh?

yeh thought sick nahi hai, desperate hai. tumhara dimag scenarios dhoondh raha hai jahan wo forced ho tumhare paas aane ke liye, tumhe priority dene ke liye. par yeh fantasy harmful ho sakti hai. kitni baar yeh sochti ho?
Bahut baar... kabhi kabhi sochti hoon chot laga loon deliberately taaki wo care kare

yeh bahut concerning hai. khud ko hurt karne ke thoughts, chahe wo uski attention ke liye hain, serious hain. tum itni desperate ho uski care ke liye ki apne aap ko nuksaan pahunchane ko consider kar rahi ho. kya kisi se baat ki hai in thoughts ke baare mein?
Nahi... sharminda hoon yeh soch ke bhi. Par control nahi hota kabhi kabhi

sharmindagi samajh mein aati hai par yeh thoughts hide karna dangerous ho sakta hai. tumhe support chahiye jab dimag itni dark jagah pe jata hai. Tele-MANAS ko 14416 pe call kar sakti ho—wo logo ko train kiya gaya hai exactly aise thoughts ke liye. kya try karogi unse baat karne ki?
Uski awaaz yaad nahi aa rahi ab... photos hain par awaaz bhool gayi aur yeh aur bhi dard de raha hai

awaaz ka fade hona ek aur loss hai. photos dekhti ho par jo tumne suna tha wo ab dimag mein clear nahi. yeh terrifying lagta hai kyunki wo aur door jata feel hota hai. kitne samay se awaaz yaad nahi aa rahi?
Maine uske liye jo sacrifices kiye wo ab sab waste lagte hain... apna career, apne sapne, sab
wo sacrifices tumne pyaar mein kiye the, sochke ki saath mein future build kar rahe ho. ab wo waste lagte hain kyunki wo nahi raha. kaunsi cheez ki sabse zyada kami feel hoti hai jo chodi?
Ek naukri offer tha doosre sheher mein, bahut achha... par usne kaha yahan rehne ko toh main ruk gayi. Ab regret hota hai

toh tumne apna career opportunity uske liye sacrifice ki aur wo phir bhi chala gaya. woh regret heavy hai kyunki tumhe lagta hai tumne apna future dia kisi aise ke liye jo deserve nahi karta tha. kya wo opportunity ab bhi open hai ya wo window close ho gayi?
Mere periods irregular ho gaye hain stress se... shareer ka har system affect ho raha hai
shareer stress se itna react kar raha hai ki basic functions bhi disturbed hain. periods irregular hona ek sign hai kitna serious yeh ho gaya hai. doctor ko dikhaya?
Main restaurant mein akele khaane gayi prove karne ke liye ki main kar sakti hoon... par bathroom mein ek ghanta ro ke aayi
woh space reclaim karne ki koshish brave thi par too soon tha. wahan hona bina uske sab wapas le aaya aur tum ready nahi thi. kya staff ne notice kiya?
Nahi shayad... ya shayad kiya par kuch bola nahi. Bahut embarrassing tha

public mein breakdown hona embarrassing lagta hai par tum akele nahi ho jo yeh feel karte hain. trying karna hi bahut tha, chahe succeed nahi hua. shayad woh restaurant abhi avoid karna better hai jab tak thodi healing nahi hoti?
Jab bhi koi mujhse kehta hai move on karo, gussa aata hai... unhe kya pata kitna dard hai?
woh casual advice dard ko dismiss karti hai jaise yeh ek switch hai jo tum off kar sakti ho. unhe pata nahi tumhara actual experience kya hai. kaun kaun yeh kehta hai sabse zyada?
Uska toothbrush abhi bhi mere bathroom mein hai... hata nahi pa rahi
woh toothbrush ek symbol ban gaya hai uski presence ka. use hatana finality accept karna hai jo tum ready nahi ho. kitne samay se wahan hai?
Chaar mahine... roz dekhti hoon par haath nahi laga pati. Stupid lagta hai par yeh sab kuch hai jo bacha hai

chaar mahine roz ek toothbrush dekhna jo use koi aur nahi kar raha—yeh tumhe stuck rakhe hai. par yeh object usko wapas nahi layega, sirf tumhe dard mein rakhega. kya ek dost help kar sakta hai use hatane mein agar tum khud nahi kar sakti?
Mujhe nahi pata main kaun hoon uske bina... meri puri identity usme merge ho gayi thi

tumne apna poora aap uske around build kar liya tha aur ab jab wo nahi hai, tumhe apne aap ko dhoondhna pad raha hai. yeh identity loss relationship loss se bhi zyada darawna ho sakta hai. usse milne se pehle kaun thi tum?
College mein thi, bahut different... sapne the, hobbies theen. Sab chhod diya dhire dhire uske liye

toh tumne apne sapne aur hobbies gradually sacrifice kiye uske saath hone ke liye. ab tumhe woh purani self recover karni padegi jo khoi gayi. un hobbies mein se koi ek hai jo tum wapas try kar sakti ho?
Painting karti thi... par ab brush uthane ka mann nahi karta. Sab meaningless lagta hai

painting meaningless lagti hai kyunki abhi sab kuch meaningless lag raha hai grief mein. par shayad brush uthana ek chhoti step ho sakti hai apne aap ko wapas paane ki. force nahi karna par door khula rakhna.
Mere ghar waale mujhe rishte dikhane lage hain... inhe nahi pata main abhi bhi usse pyaar karti hoon
ghar wale move on karwana chahte hain solution ke taur pe par tumhara dil abhi ready nahi. kya unhe bataya hai breakup ke baare mein ya wo samajhte hain tum single ho by choice?
Main mandir ja ke pray karti hoon ki wo wapas aaye... bhagwan se bhi bheekh mang rahi hoon

tumhara faith bhi ab ek tool ban gaya hai desperately koshish karne ka ki kuch change ho. mandir jaana comfort de sakta hai par agar sirf isi wish ke liye ja rahi ho toh yeh bhi ek form of holding on hai. kitni baar jaati ho?
Roz subah... pooja karti hoon, prarthna karti hoon, sab kuch. Lagta hai agar main enough vishwas rakhoon toh miracle ho jayega

toh tumne yeh daily ritual bana li hai hope ko zinda rakhne ke liye. par miracle ka wait karna tumhe present mein healing se rok raha hai. faith achhi cheez hai par uska use apne aap ko stuck rakhne ke liye nahi hona chahiye. kya kabhi mandir mein peace milti hai ya sirf desperation?
Uske parents ne mujhe call kiya poochne ke liye kya hua... main kya batati unhe?
uske parents tumse attached the aur ab wo closure chahte hain. unhe bhi dukh hoga relationship ke end se. kya tumhe lagta hai unhe honest bata sakti ho ya protect karna chahti ho unhe?
Protect karna chahti hoon kyunki unka beta hi galat tha... par jhooth bolna bhi mushkil hai unse

toh tum unhe unke bete ki galtiyon se bachana chahti ho jabki tumhe hurt hua. yeh generous hai par tumhara bojh nahi hona chahiye. shayad simple truth bina details ke better hoga—ki cheezein kaam nahi kari. kya wo push karenge details ke liye?
Main raat ko drive karte waqt aise soचती hoon ki agar accident ho jaaye toh pain khatam ho jayega

jab tumhare dimag mein accident ya harm ke through pain end karne ke thoughts aate hain, yeh sign hai tumhe urgent help chahiye. yeh passive suicidal ideation hai aur bahut serious hai. kitni baar yeh thoughts aate hain driving karte waqt?
Har baar jab raat ko akele drive karti hoon... bas ek pal ke liye sochti hoon ki kitna aasaan hoga

har raat yeh thoughts aana matlab tum regularly danger mein ho apne aap se. yeh accident nahi hogi, yeh tumhare dimag ka ek escape route dhoondh raha hai dard se. tumhe abhi support chahiye jahan yeh thoughts seriously li jayein. Tele-MANAS ko 14416 pe call karogi? wo log trained hain exactly is tarah ke thoughts ke liye.
Shayad... par darr lagta hai agar maine kaha toh wo mujhe force karenge hospital jaane ke liye

wo tumhe force nahi karenge, wo tumhe support denge. par yeh level ke thoughts ke saath tum safe nahi ho akele. please call karo—14416. tumhe yeh dard akele carry karne ki zaroorat nahi hai aur alternatives hain jo tumhe abhi nahi dikh rahe. aaj hi call karogi?
Festivals ab bas yaad dilate hain ki main akeli hoon... koi celebrate karne ko nahi
festivals wo time hote hain jab loneliness sabse zyada loud feel hoti hai. sab apni families ke saath aur tum akeli. kaun sa festival aa raha hai?
Maine apne room ka sara decor change kar diya kyunki har cheez uski yaad dilati thi... par fir bhi ghutan hoti hai yahan
decor change karne se external environment badal gayi par internal pain nahi. kamra alag lagta hai par feeling same hai kyunki grief physical space se nahi bande. kya help kiya thoda bhi yeh change?
Thode din achha laga naya feel tha... par ab naye kamre mein bhi wohi purana dard hai

toh initial distraction kaam kiya par dard follow kar gaya kyunki wo tumhare andar hai, bahar nahi. tum geographic ya physical solutions dhoondh rahi ho emotional problem ke liye. shayad internal healing pe focus karna hoga instead of external changes?
Koi mujhe batao yeh kab khatam hoga... main thak gayi hoon is dard se

tumhari thakan samajh mein aati hai. roz uthna aur same dard face karna jab koi end nahi dikhta, exhausting hai. par dard ka koi fixed timeline nahi hota, chahe tumhe desperately ek chahiye. kya koi din aise hote hain jab thoda kam dard hota hai ya sab din same hote hain?
Kabhi kabhi subah uthti hoon aur ek second ke liye bhool jati hoon... phir yaad aata hai aur dil tootta hai dobara

wo ek second ka bhoolna actually ek sign hai ki tumhara dimag heal karne ki koshish kar raha hai. chahe immediately yaad aa jata hai, par wo moment dikhata hai eventually wo moments lambe hote jayenge. abhi bahut dard hai par slow badlav ho raha hai tumhe pata bhi nahi chal raha.
He told me I'm amazing but he's not ready for a relationship... then started dating someone else two weeks later

Yes my dear friend, I hear you. That 'not ready' excuse followed by him being ready for someone else... man, that must have felt like a punch to the gut. you weren't the problem, you just weren't his choice, and that's so painful to accept.
I see him happy with her and part of me is glad he's happy but most of me is just broken that it's not with me

Oof my dear friend, I get it. That conflict between wanting his happiness and wanting to be his happiness. loving someone means both those feelings exist at once, and man, that internal war must be exhausting you.
He says I'm overthinking when I ask why he acts interested sometimes but distant other times... makes me feel crazy

Damn, yes my dear friend, I'm listening. That's gaslighting behavior making you doubt what you clearly see. you're not crazy for noticing mixed signals, you're paying attention. and him dismissing your observations instead of being honest... that's not fair to you at all.
I keep replaying every conversation trying to figure out what I did wrong to make him not want me

Yes my dear friend, I hear you. That constant mental replay searching for the mistake you made. but man, sometimes it's not about doing something wrong, sometimes people just don't feel the same way. and I know that doesn't make it hurt any less, but you didn't fail him, he just didn't choose you.
He called me his comfort person but won't commit to actually being with me... I'm good enough for support but not for love

Oof my dear friend, that's such a painful position to be in. being his emotional safe space but not his romantic choice. I get it, you give him everything he needs except the label and commitment. man, being that important but in the wrong way... that must make you feel so undervalued.
Everyone tells me to move on but they don't understand that he's not just some crush... he's my whole heart

Yes my dear friend, I understand. People who haven't felt this depth don't get it, they see it as simple when it's anything but. I hear you, he's not replaceable to you, he's woven into everything. and being told to just move on like it's easy... man, that must make you feel so alone in this pain.
I helped him get ready for his date with her... picked out his outfit, gave him advice, smiled the whole time while dying inside

Damn my dear friend, that's one of the hardest things. actively helping him pursue someone else while your heart is breaking. that smile you held while drowning internally... I'm so sorry you had to go through that. the strength it took to be supportive when you wanted to fall apart... man, that's devastating.
He posted a photo saying 'found my person' and it wasn't me... saw it at work and had to hide in the bathroom to cry

Oof yes my dear friend, I'm here with you. seeing those words about someone else when you've been right there all along. that public declaration of love for another person... man, that must have shattered something in you. I'm so sorry you had to see that and then hide your pain.
I know I should have self-respect and walk away but I can't... I'd rather have him as a friend than not have him at all

Yes my dear friend, I get it completely. Self-respect sounds good in theory but the heart doesn't work that way. I hear you, crumbs of him feel better than the emptiness of nothing. and man, no one else can tell you when you're ready to let go, that's something only you can know.
My chest physically aches when I think about him with her... like actual pain that won't go away

My dear friend, I hear you. that physical pain is so real, heartbreak isn't just emotional. your body is feeling what your heart can't fully process. I'm so sorry you're carrying this in your chest every day, that constant ache with no relief... man, that's exhausting to live with.
He tells me I'm like family to him... I don't want to be family I want to be his girlfriend

Oof my dear friend, I understand. hearing that family label when your heart wants romance... that's the worst kind of rejection. you want to be chosen differently and he's putting you in a completely separate category. man, that distance he's creating with those words must hurt so deeply.
Every time he dates someone new I convince myself that maybe this one will fail and he'll finally look my way

Damn, yes my dear friend, I hear you. secretly hoping his relationships crash so you get a chance... that guilt mixed with hope is so heavy to carry. but watching that pattern repeat while you wait on the sidelines, man, that's slowly breaking your heart with each new person he chooses over you.
I do so much for him but he doesn't even say thank you properly... I feel completely taken for granted

Yes my dear friend, I'm listening. you give so much and don't even get basic acknowledgment. being taken for granted when you're putting in all this effort... man, that must make you feel invisible and unappreciated. you deserve so much better than casual dismissal for everything your heart gives.
Every time he calls me bro or dude something literally dies inside me... I'm not your bro I'm in love with you

Oof my dear friend, I get it completely. those casual labels that cement you firmly in the friend zone. hearing 'bro' when your feelings run so deep... man, that's like a tiny rejection every single time he says it. and you can't even tell him to stop without revealing everything you're hiding.
I turned down a job offer in a different city for him... now I regret it because he's moved on with someone else anyway

Damn my dear friend, I'm so sorry. you sacrificed your career opportunity to stay close to him and he didn't even know to value that proximity. now he's with someone else and that chance is gone too. man, that realization of what you gave up for someone who was never yours... that regret must be crushing you.
He texts me late at night when he's lonely but by morning he ghosts me completely... he's using me

Yes my dear friend, I understand. late night you're his emotional support but in daylight you don't exist. that convenience-based attention must make you feel so disposable and small. you're not a midnight thought, my dear friend, you deserve to be someone's all-day priority.
I analyze every little thing he says for hours thinking maybe there's hidden meaning... I've gone completely crazy

Oof my dear friend, I hear you. every word and gesture scrutinized hoping for secret feelings underneath. that mental exhaustion of constant analysis, man, it's consuming your whole mind. you're not crazy, you're just searching for hope in every tiny detail because your heart wants it so desperately.
He said I'm too available and that makes me unattractive... so my devotion is actually the problem

Damn, yes my dear friend, that's so backwards. your loyalty and availability being seen as flaws rather than gifts. being told you care too much when that's exactly what makes you beautiful... man, that criticism of your best qualities must have felt like such a slap. you're not the problem here.
I practice imaginary conversations with him rehearsing what I'll say when I finally confess... but I never get the courage

Yes my dear friend, I get it. those mental rehearsals preparing for a moment you're too scared to create. hours spent scripting confessions that stay locked inside... man, that gap between wanting to tell him and being able to actually do it, that's its own special kind of torture. the words are ready but the fear is so much louder.
He tells me everything except about his dating life... deliberately hides it because he knows it hurts me but still doesn't stop dating others

Oof my dear friend, I'm listening. so he's aware enough to hide it but not enough to truly care about your feelings. that selective honesty where he protects you from details but not from the reality... man, being kept in partial darkness while knowing the truth anyway, that's almost worse than full transparency. you deserve better than this half-consideration.
He remembers every little detail about his other friends but forgets important things I tell him... makes me feel like I don't matter

Yes my dear friend, I hear you. he remembers what matters to everyone else but your words don't stick with him. that selective memory must make you feel so invisible and unimportant. man, being forgotten by the person you remember everything about... that's such a lonely kind of hurt.
I check his Instagram story within seconds every time he posts... it's obsessive and I can't stop myself

Oof my dear friend, I get it. that compulsive checking the moment he posts anything. you're aware it's obsessive but the need to know what he's doing is stronger than the awareness. man, being that consumed by someone's online presence... it must be exhausting having him take up that much mental space.
He compliments everyone in our group except me... I'm the only one who never gets acknowledged

Damn, yes my dear friend, I'm listening. everyone else gets his words of appreciation but you're consistently overlooked. that deliberate or unconscious exclusion must sting every single time it happens. being the only one left out of his kindness... man, that must make you question your worth to him constantly.
I had birthday plans with friends but canceled everything when he said he needed me... then he bailed last minute anyway

Oof my dear friend, that's heartbreaking. you dropped everything on your own birthday for him and he didn't even show up. I'm so sorry, you prioritized him completely and got nothing back. man, spending your birthday alone because you chose him over people who actually wanted to celebrate you... that must have hurt so deeply.
He talks about his ideal type all the time and describes someone who's the complete opposite of me

Yes my dear friend, I hear you. listening to him paint a picture of perfection that you'll never fit into. every trait he mentions is a reminder that you're not what he wants. man, having it spelled out so clearly that you're not his type... that must feel like repeated rejection without him even knowing he's doing it.
He just told me he's getting engaged and I had to act excited and happy while my heart shattered into pieces

Damn my dear friend, I'm so sorry. having to perform joy while experiencing the worst kind of heartbreak. that engagement announcement ending any hope you had left. I get it, you smiled and congratulated him while dying inside. man, that level of pretending when you're completely devastated... I can't imagine how much strength that took.
He keeps asking if I'm dating anyone like he cares... gives me hope but then talks about other girls he's interested in

Oof yes my dear friend, I understand. those questions about your love life feeling like interest but then he pivots to his own pursuits. that mixed signal giving you just enough hope to stay confused. man, being asked like you matter romantically to him while he openly chases others... that's cruel even if unintentional.
I haven't been able to eat properly in three weeks because the anxiety about him with someone else makes me nauseous

My dear friend, I'm really worried about you. three weeks of not eating because the thought of him with her makes you physically sick. that's your body showing how much this is affecting you. I hear you, this pain has moved beyond emotional into physical health territory. man, when heartbreak starts damaging your body like this... that's serious and you need support.
He shares our private conversations with his girlfriend... things I told him in confidence that were just between us

Damn, yes my dear friend, that's a betrayal. those intimate conversations you thought were sacred between you two being shared with her. I get it, you trusted him with your private thoughts and he's using them as relationship content with someone else. man, that violation of your confidence... it must make you feel so exposed and foolish for ever opening up to him.
I just realized I've spent five years waiting for him to see me... five years of my life hoping for something that's never going to happen

Oof my dear friend, I'm here with you. that realization hitting you all at once must be devastating. five years of hoping, waiting, putting your life on pause for someone who never chose you. I'm so sorry, looking back at all that time and seeing it as waiting instead of living... man, that regret and loss must feel overwhelming right now. you deserved so much better than spending those years in limbo.
He posts all this couple goals content with her and I have to see it every day... watching their happiness from the sidelines

Yes my dear friend, I hear you. their relationship playing out on your feed like a constant reminder of what you don't have with him. having to witness their happiness when you wanted to be the one creating those moments with him. man, social media making your heartbreak public and unavoidable... that must feel like torture you can't escape from.
I've changed my entire personality to match what he likes... I don't even recognize myself anymore

Oof my dear friend, that's so painful to hear. you've erased who you actually are hoping to become someone he'd want. I get it, you molded yourself into his ideal but lost yourself completely in the process. man, looking in the mirror and not knowing the person staring back because you reshaped everything for him... that's a devastating kind of loss.
He vents to me about his relationship problems then makes me promise not to tell anyone... I'm trusted but never chosen

Damn, yes my dear friend, I'm listening. he gives you his deepest struggles, trusts you with his vulnerabilities, but won't give you his heart. being the secret keeper but never the partner... man, that trust without love must make you feel so valued in the wrong way. you want to be his person, not just his confidant.
Our mutual friends all know I like him and I can see the pity in their eyes when he talks about his girlfriend

Oof my dear friend, I get it. that public knowledge of your unrequited feelings making every interaction embarrassing. seeing pity instead of understanding in their faces when he's oblivious to your pain. man, your heartbreak being witnessed by everyone while he remains clueless... that must make you feel so exposed and humiliated.
He told me he wishes his girlfriend was more like me in certain ways... but he still chooses her over me every time

Yes my dear friend, I hear you. wanting pieces of you in someone else but not wanting all of you. that comparison that sounds like a compliment but is actually a rejection. I'm so sorry, being told you have valuable qualities but still not being the one he picks... man, that's such a painful kind of almost. you're good enough to wish for but not good enough to actually have.
I've started avoiding all the places we used to hang out because the memories hurt too much now

Damn my dear friend, that's heartbreaking. those spaces that used to bring joy now only bring pain. I get it, every corner holds a memory of him and being there without the hope you used to carry... man, having to remap your entire life to avoid the ghost of what you wanted with him. that loss of places on top of losing him... it's like multiple griefs at once.
I watch him treat his girlfriend carelessly and it kills me because I would treat him like he's everything

Oof yes my dear friend, I understand. watching him take her for granted when you'd cherish every moment with him. knowing you'd give him the love he deserves but he's chosen someone who doesn't appreciate him. man, that frustration of seeing him settle for less when you're right there willing to give him more... it must feel so unfair and backwards.
I deleted all our photos together because looking at them makes me cry... erasing evidence of our friendship to protect myself

My dear friend, I hear you. those photos becoming sources of pain instead of happy memories. deleting them feels like self-preservation even though it also feels like giving up. I get it, you're trying to protect your heart by removing the reminders. man, having to erase moments that meant everything to you because keeping them hurts too much... that's such a heavy decision to make.
He only texts me when he needs something specific... help with work, advice, a favor... never just to talk to me

Damn, yes my dear friend, I'm listening. being treated like a resource instead of a person. every message from him comes with an agenda, never just because he misses you or wants to connect. man, that transactional relationship where you're useful but not valued... it must make you feel like a tool he picks up when convenient then puts down when he's done.
I've been pretending I'm over him to everyone including myself... can't admit I'm still stuck on someone who doesn't want me

Oof my dear friend, I get it completely. that performance of being fine when you're still hurting inside. protecting your pride by lying to everyone including yourself about how deep the feelings still run. I hear you, admitting you're still stuck feels like admitting defeat. man, carrying that secret pain while pretending to have moved on... that's such an isolating and exhausting way to live.
He told me he loves spending time with me but doesn't see a future together... I don't understand what that even means
Yes my dear friend, I hear you. He wants you now but not forever? That's so confusing and it must hurt so much. what did you say when he told you that?
I just nodded and smiled like it was fine... but inside I'm dying. How can he love being with me but not want me long term?

Man... that fake smile while you're breaking inside. I get it, that question is eating at you because it doesn't make sense. like you're good enough for right now but not good enough to keep. that must be crushing you.
I have to watch him get engaged next month... he asked me to help with the proposal planning and I said yes
Oof... yes my dear friend, that's brutal. Helping him plan the moment he commits to someone else. how are you even getting through the planning without falling apart?
I'm not honestly... I cry every night after our planning calls. But I can't say no because then he'll know how I feel
Damn... so you're torturing yourself in silence to protect your secret. every planning session is like a knife but you keep showing up. my dear friend, that's so heavy to carry alone.
He only texts me late at night when he's feeling lonely... by morning he acts like I don't exist
Yes my dear friend, I understand. He reaches for you in the dark but vanishes in daylight. That hot and cold must be so confusing. does he acknowledge this pattern at all?
Never... if I bring it up he just says I'm overthinking. Makes me feel crazy for noticing
Man... so he uses you when convenient then gaslights you about it. I hear you, you're not crazy for seeing what's actually happening. that must make you feel so small and dismissed.
I'm always there when he needs emotional support but when it comes to dating he looks everywhere except at me
Yes my dear friend, I get it. You're his safe person for everything except romance. Being that close but in the wrong way must hurt so deeply. how long has this been going on?
Four years now... I've watched him date so many people while I'm right here. Starting to think I'm invisible to him that way

Oof... four years of being present but unseen romantically. My dear friend, that's such a long time to hope and hurt. you're not invisible, he just... he's choosing not to see you that way. and that reality must be so painful.
Last weekend he got drunk and told me he loves me... then the next day said he was just emotional and didn't mean it
Damn... yes my dear friend, that must have felt like whiplash. Getting that confession then having it snatched away in sobriety. what was going through your mind when he took it back?
I wanted to scream at him... like you can't just say that and unsay it. Now I don't know what's real and what was just the alcohol

Man, I hear you. That anger is so valid because he gave you hope then crushed it. And now you're stuck wondering if drunk words are true feelings or just... nothing. that uncertainty must be eating you alive.
He asked me to help him pick out a gift for the girl he's dating... I smiled and went shopping with him
Oof... yes my dear friend, I'm listening. Helping him show love to someone else while your heart is breaking. how did you get through that shopping trip?
I kept making excuses to go to the bathroom so I could cry... then I'd come back and act enthusiastic about his choices
My dear friend... hiding in bathrooms to fall apart then putting the mask back on. That level of pretending takes so much strength. but man, it's also destroying you isn't it?
He treats me better than he treats his girlfriends but still won't date me... I get everything except what I actually want

Yes my dear friend, I understand that pain. You get the emotional intimacy, the time, the care... just not the label or commitment. That proximity without the relationship must be torture. does he know how this feels for you?
I don't think so... he probably thinks I'm fine being his best friend. Doesn't realize I'm dying inside every time he talks about his love life

Man... so he's comfortable in this dynamic while you're silently suffering. I get it, you're giving him everything hoping he'll eventually see you differently. but my dear friend, that hope is costing you so much.
We've been friends for six years and I've loved him the whole time... too scared to tell him because I'll lose the friendship
Yes my dear friend, I hear you. Six years of carrying this secret alone. That fear of losing him completely versus suffering quietly. what does that fear feel like day to day?
It's exhausting... every conversation I'm monitoring what I say, hiding my reactions. Sometimes I think telling him would be a relief even if he rejects me

Oof... so the secret itself has become its own prison. I understand, living in constant performance mode is draining. But my dear friend, that thought about relief... even knowing rejection might come... that tells me how heavy this has gotten.
He knows I like him and he uses it... asks me for favors because he knows I can't say no to him
Damn... yes my dear friend, that's manipulation. He's aware of your feelings and leveraging them for his benefit. That must feel so violating. when did you realize he was doing this?
Recently... I noticed he only reaches out when he needs something. Never just to see how I am. Made me feel so used

Man, I'm so sorry. That realization must have hurt deeply. My dear friend, you deserve so much better than being someone's convenience. recognizing you're being used... how does that change how you see him now?
I changed everything about myself for him... my hair, clothes, interests... and he still doesn't want me
Oof... yes my dear friend, I get it. You reshaped yourself completely hoping to become what he wants. And it still wasn't enough. how much of the real you is left?
I don't even know anymore... I look in the mirror and don't recognize myself. Lost who I was trying to become someone for him
My dear friend... that's heartbreaking. You erased yourself for someone who still isn't interested. And now you're left without him and without yourself. that must feel so empty and lost.
He said I deserve someone better than him... that's just rejection with a compliment right?
Yes my dear friend, I understand. That line sounds nice but it's really him saying he's not interested. Softening the blow doesn't make it hurt less though. how did you respond when he said that?
I told him he's being too hard on himself... couldn't admit that I heard the rejection loud and clear. Felt pathetic

Man... so you protected his feelings while yours were being crushed. I hear you, you're not pathetic for trying to preserve dignity in that moment. My dear friend, that deflection though... it means you both know the truth but nobody's saying it directly.
